field.name: summary
field.value: broken link - cannot access the documentation for latest release (RC2)

field.name: description
field.value: On this page: http://www.castleproject.org/activerecord/documentation/index.html I tried to access the documentation for the latest release (RC2). It is a broken link

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text:
Removed broken link.
I'm about preparing docs for a future release. Please use RC1 docs or ugrade to trunk (recommended)

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: Fixed by removing the broken link. Please either use docs for v1rc1 or update to trunk (recommended)
